meanings.definition: A meal made from ground soybeans.
meanings.sent1: I added some soymeal to my smoothie for extra protein.
meanings.sent2: The cafeteria served soymeal burgers for lunch today.
meanings.sent3: The soymeal in my stir-fry decided to dance around the pan.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of soymeal, adding flavor to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The soymeal looked like tiny golden nuggets, ready to be cooked into a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: The residue left after extracting oil from soybeans.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used soymeal as fertilizer for his crops.
meanings.sent2: After pressing the soybeans, all that was left was soymeal.
meanings.sent3: The soymeal pile in the corner of the field started telling jokes.
meanings.sent4: The soymeal scattered on the ground resembled fallen stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The smell of soymeal lingered in the air, a reminder of the soybean oil extraction process.
